name: Rubik's Ants (LD41)
description:
Manage an ant colony on a Rubik's cube. 

Instructions:

  • Use the left mouse button to turn the sides of the cube.
  • Move the camera with the right mouse button.
  • Gather sugar cubes to increase spawn rate.
  • Gather needles to grow your nests.
  • Gather crystals to increase ant lifespan.

Made for Ludum Dare 41: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/rubiks-ants
